name: Design House Agency
tagline: Web Designer in Coral Gables, Florida
description: Founded in 2010, Design House is a boutique, digital agency & web design company with a team of pioneer designers, coders, & strategists obsessed with design, UX & web marketing. Headquartered in Miami-Coral Gables, Florida, servicing brands worldwide. Their specialties are Web design, Search Engine Optimization (SEO), Web development, PPC management, Content Marketing, Brand identity / logo design, Social Media Marketing, Video & Photography, and Web marketing.
